QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Physical examination
QAPair.Answer: During a physical examination, a health care provider checks your body to determine if you do or do not have a physical problem. A physical examination usually includes: Inspection (looking at the body), Palpation (feeling the body with fingers or hands), Auscultation (listening to sounds, usually with a stethoscope), Percussion (producing sounds, usually by tapping on specific areas of the body) ,
